name: formbricks
description: Formbricks is an open-source survey and form platform designed to be an alternative to Typeform with complete data control. It includes a rich builder UI, analytics, and embeddable widgets, supporting both SaaS and self-hosted flows.
features: Surveys: Open-source form builder, Rich UI builder, Analytics dashboard. Typeform alternative with data control.
Embeddable: Add forms to any site. Flexible integration.
Data Control: Complete ownership of responses. Privacy-first.
SaaS or Self-Hosted: Choose your deployment. Flexible hosting.
Conditional Logic: Dynamic form flows. Smart surveys.
Response Analytics: Visualize survey data. Actionable insights.
Custom Branding: White-label forms. Your brand.
API Access: Integrate with tools. Automation-ready.
